text:
Unexpected call,
Old friends reunite with laughs,
Warmth spreads, hearts alight.

Echoes of laughter,
Old friends on a screen collide,
Years meld, joy ignites.

Hopeful hearts converge,
Time rewinds, old bonds emerge,
Bright future takes shape.

Wheels spin, wind through hair,
Golden coast, our youth we share,
Mem'ries of the ride.

Three decades have passed,
Instants bond across the miles,
Friendship never fades.
